channel.title: Making items wield in the right spot
channel.description: OK SO ONE OF MY ITEMS WONT WIELD IN THE RIGHT SPOT WHERE COULD I CHANGE IT I WANT A HAT TO WIELD IN THE HAT SPOT ANY HELP

item.title: Making items wield in the right spot
item.dc:creator: @boypipo boypipo
item.description:
@boypipo wrote:

hey i had the same probelm
here this is what you do.

open client.java
and then ctr. F and search for any command *i use “pickup”
then under that command under the ( or w.e
put this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
toX = 3087;
toY = 3490;
}

remeber to make sure its under the ( or the )

so it should look like this
)
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
toX = 3087;
toY = 3490;
}

Just change the coords to what you like.

Read full topic
